charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS knowingly did conspire to distribute and possess with intent to distribute a quantity of cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance, and a quantity of marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance, in violation of 21:841(a)(1), (b)(1),(C), and (b)(1)(D)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to custody of Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 78 months. Remanded to Marshal. Court recommends: 1. The defendant be allowed to serve his sentence at a facility as close as possible to Florence County, S.C., assuming he qualifies. 2. Defendant be allowed to participate in drug treatment or rehabilitation counseling programs available with Bureau of Prisons. Upon release, defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years. While on supervised release, defendant shall comply with the mandatory and standard conditions of supervision outlined in 18:3583(d) and the following special condition: the defendant shall satisfactorily participate in a substance abuse treatment program, to include drug testing, as approved by the U.S. Probation Office. $100 special assessment due immediately

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), (b)(1)(C), and (b)(1)(D) NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE did knowingly possess with intent to distribute a quantity of cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance, and a quantity of marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance, and 18:2 AID AND ABET(2)

18:924 (c)(1)(A) VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN knowingly did use and carry firearms, during and in relation to, and did possess the firearms in furtherance of, the drug trafficking crimes named in Counts 1 and 2 AND 18:2 AID AND ABET(3)

21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS knowingly did conspire to distribute and possess with intent to distribute a quantity of cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance, and a quantity of marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance, in violation of 21:841(a)(1), (b)(1),(C), and (b)(1)(D)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to custody of Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 21 months as to Count 1. In accordance with statute, defendant is sentenced to custody of Bureau of Prisons 60 months as to Count 3. This term shall run consecutively to the previous imposed sentence. Total aggregate sentence: 81 months. Remanded to Marshal. Court recommends: Defendant be allowed to participate in drug rehabilitation or counseling available with BOP. 2. Defendant serve his sentence at a facility as close as possible to Florence, S.C. Upon release, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 5 years. This term consists of 3 years as to Count 1 and 5 years as to Count 3; all such terms shall run concurrently. While on supervised release, the defendant shall comply with the mandatory and standard conditions of supervision outlined in 18 U.S.C. 3583(d) and the following special condition: The defendant shall satisfactorily participate in a substance abuse treatment program, to include drug testing, as approved by the U.S. Probation Office. $200.00 special assessment due immediately

charges.charge_description: 18:924 (c)(1)(A) VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN knowingly did use and carry firearms, during and in relation to, and did possess the firearms in furtherance of, the drug trafficking crimes named in Counts 1 and 2 AND 18:2 AID AND ABET(3)
